org.catechis.file
Class FileJDOMWordLists

java.lang.Object
  org.catechis.file.FileJDOMWordLists
All Implemented Interfaces:
WordLists
public class FileJDOMWordLists
extends java.lang.Object
implements WordLists

This class can be used to add words to lists of new words so that a list of new words which have not been tested can be viewed as priority on the list.

When putting a new word, it will be added to reading and writing lists, but when getting lists, the caller must specify which type of list they want.

The files are in the /subject/lists/new words reading.list and writing.list

1234567890

word file name.xml

(text as bytes)

(def as bytes)

The primary category is the file name in this case.

getEarliestDate

public java.lang.String getEarliestDate(Word word)
This method will return the date of the first test. We take one day off this to simulate the date of first entry, as the early developer failed to capture this info from the start.

If there is no date of entry, and the word has no tests (it must be like a weird old word lost in space) then we use the current date.
